snippet.textDisplay: What I enjoy about your channel is you spotlight the novelty, quirky and downright fun gear as well. I'm so tired of everyone just min-maxing meta gear and forgetting how fun creative thinking can be.

snippet.textDisplay: You can also get legendaries by spawning at every safe house. Just spend a little bit of time spawning in every safe house one by one and they will pop up for sale in the gun vending machines. Yes it takes a bit of time but at least you donâ€™t have to fight any raid bosses. Youâ€™re welcomeâ€¦.

snippet.textDisplay:
Buoys is pronounced Boys. It's a silent "u"

Buoy is what's dumped in water and used as a floating marker using "buoyancy" (boy-an-see)

snippet.textDisplay: Can someone please tell Gearbox that they need to fire whoever okayed the sound of the active vehicles. Slowing down/speeding up/maintaining speed should not all make the same noise that sounds like a jet flying overhead. Doppler effect is not something that should be generated for audio of the vehicle for the driver.
snippet.textOriginal: Can someone please tell Gearbox that they need to fire whoever okayed the sound of the active vehicles. Slowing down/speeding up/maintaining speed should not all make the same noise that sounds like a jet flying overhead. Doppler effect is not something that should be generated for audio of the vehicle for the driver.

snippet.textDisplay: Unsure if anyone has mentioned this or experienced it, but the Root Legendary sniper you get from Mimicron is good, but it glitches out bosses for me so often and I know its caused by it because it never happens with any other weapon. It has made 2 of the 3 Foundry Freaks disappear and glitch out, Horace, Mimicron, Divisioner, and most any other boss I use it against. Its awesome, but having that constant risk sucks because the only way to fix it is quit the game and load back in.
snippet.textOriginal: Unsure if anyone has mentioned this or experienced it, but the Root Legendary sniper you get from Mimicron is good, but it glitches out bosses for me so often and I know its caused by it because it never happens with any other weapon. It has made 2 of the 3 Foundry Freaks disappear and glitch out, Horace, Mimicron, Divisioner, and most any other boss I use it against. Its awesome, but having that constant risk sucks because the only way to fix it is quit the game and load back in.

snippet.textDisplay: The Lead Balloon is best used with the Atlas underbarrel that's in its licensed part pool. With that and a Torgue enhancement that provides the improved splash damage and radius (and ideally a Legendary with that and Airburst), you can tag the bottom half of an enemy at long range and have the shots just rip upward through it, flooding the area around a boss with MIRVs. It's hilarious.
snippet.textOriginal: The Lead Balloon is best used with the Atlas underbarrel that's in its licensed part pool. With that and a Torgue enhancement that provides the improved splash damage and radius (and ideally a Legendary with that and Airburst), you can tag the bottom half of an enemy at long range and have the shots just rip upward through it, flooding the area around a boss with MIRVs. It's hilarious.
